item.title: Comment on A Brutally Honest Review Of The MTN HyNetflex Router by Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya

item.title: Comment on A Brutally Honest Review Of The MTN HyNetflex Router by Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/mtn-hynetflex-honest-review/#comment-1706">charles</a>.
No, you don't have to. The two bands would be broadcasted (Except you disable one) and it would look like you have two wifi routers when you scan it on your devices.
You can always connect to which one of the two you want to use.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to charles.

No, you don’t have to. The two bands would be broadcasted (Except you disable one) and it would look like you have two wifi routers when you scan it on your devices.

You can always connect to which one of the two you want to use.

item.content:encoded:

item.title: Comment on A Brutally Honest Review Of The MTN HyNetflex Router by charles

item.description: Hi boss my mtn hynetflex range is so poor i literally need to be so close to it before it can see the wifi or connect to the wifi how can i tackle this problem
item.content:encoded: Hi boss my mtn hynetflex range is so poor i literally need to be so close to it before it can see the wifi or connect to the wifi how can i tackle this problem

item.title: Comment on How to Fix The “SMS Keeps Loading” Problem on The MTN MiFi by CBNc Global
item.dc:creator: CBNc Global
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/how-to-fix-the-sms-keeps-loading-problem-on-the-mtn-mifi/#comment-1391">Fred</a>.
You have to reset the mifi to be able to access the SMS, remove the back cover of the device, use a pin to press and hold the reset button until the light flashes in correspondence, then you can be able to access your SMS.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Fred.

You have to reset the mifi to be able to access the SMS, remove the back cover of the device, use a pin to press and hold the reset button until the light flashes in correspondence, then you can be able to access your SMS.
